tool.name: SAGA.sim_landscape_evolution.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySURFACE_T0 False isArrayREGOLITH_T0 False isArrayALLOCHTHONE False output_data_SURFACE $output_data_SURFACE output_data_REGOLITH $output_data_REGOLITH output_data_DIFFERENCE $output_data_DIFFERENCE name SAGA.sim_landscape_evolution.0 SURFACE_T0 $SURFACE_T0 REGOLITH_T0 $REGOLITH_T0 REGOLITH_T0_DEFAULT $REGOLITH_T0_DEFAULT ALLOCHTHONE $ALLOCHTHONE ALLOCHTHONE_DEFAULT $ALLOCHTHONE_DEFAULT TIME_START $TIME_START TIME_STOP $TIME_STOP TIME_STEP $TIME_STEP DIFFUSIVE_KD $DIFFUSIVE_KD DIFFUSIVE_NEIGHBOURS $DIFFUSIVE_NEIGHBOURS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SURFACE $OutputSection_SURFACE.outputType_SURFACE transmissionMode_SURFACE $OutputSection_SURFACE.transmissionMode_SURFACE outputType_REGOLITH $OutputSection_REGOLITH.outputType_REGOLITH transmissionMode_REGOLITH $OutputSection_REGOLITH.transmissionMode_REGOLITH outputType_DIFFERENCE $OutputSection_DIFFERENCE.outputType_DIFFERENCE transmissionMode_DIFFERENCE $OutputSection_DIFFERENCE.transmissionMode_DIFFERENCE

param.name: SURFACE_T0
param.label: Initial Surface Elevation
param.help: Initial Surface Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: REGOLITH_T0
param.label: Initial Regolith Thickness
param.help: Initial sediment cover (m) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: REGOLITH_T0_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: ALLOCHTHONE
param.label: Allochthone Input
param.help: Allochthone input in meter per year (e.g. of aeolian origin, 'Loess'). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: ALLOCHTHONE_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SURFACE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SURFACE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_REGOLITH
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_REGOLITH
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DIFFERENCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DIFFERENCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This is the implementation of a Soil and Landscape Evolution Model (SaLEM) for the spatiotemporal investigation of soil parent material evolution following a lithologically differentiated approach. The model needs a digital elevation model and (paleo-)climatic data for the simulation of weathering, erosion and transport processes. Weathering is controlled by user defined functions in dependence of climate conditions, local slope, regolith cover and outcropping bedrock lithology. Lithology can be supplied as a set of grids, of which each grid represents the top elevation of the underlying bedrock type.
